entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Orangeville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:54 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mono Centre 09:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
Temperature: 1.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 61 %
Dewpoint: -5.4°C
Wind: SW 22 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy or rain showers. High plus 4 with temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then rain showers or flurries at times heavy changing to flurries at times heavy then changing to 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon then increasing to 40 gusting to 60. High plus 4 with temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 this evening then becoming light late this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
